body_html:
I got a similar error when following tutorial
http://pytorch.org/tutorials/beginner/nlp/deep_learning_tutorial.html
There was a warning:
/usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/ipykernel_launcher.py:3: UserWarning: Implicit dimension choice for softmax has been deprecated. Change the call to include dim=X as an argument.
This is separate from the ipykernel package so we can avoid doing imports until
BTW: I am running pytorch in jupyter notebook.

body:
I got a similar error when following tutorial 
http://pytorch.org/tutorials/beginner/nlp/deep_learning_tutorial.html
There was a warning:
/usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/ipykernel_launcher.py:3: UserWarning: Implicit dimension choice for softmax has been deprecated. Change the call to include dim=X as an argument.
  This is separate from the ipykernel package so we can avoid doing imports until
BTW: I am running pytorch in jupyter notebook.
